Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c5c4c10f-a590-48d3-aab1-a59934db7bc8","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Input:
  name   → import target (e.g., "requests" or ".utils")
  level  → relative import depth (0 for absolute, 1+ for relative)

Process:
  1. Check if built-in → Record edge and return
  2. Resolve import level (relative imports)
  3. Attempt to load module (multiple strategies)
  4. Classify: internal or external?
  5. Record dependency in graph
  6. Return normalized path

Output:
  Updated import graph
  Module name or path for reference","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"486735cd-7be8-44d7-be71-9b277fe8e95d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b17f1310-ed9e-40c9-bf46-a942253e8471","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Import Classification","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de340a8a-5eac-4973-9eb9-61e2eae2693d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Built-in Modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9805c902-e7be-4649-a94b-150aa82f7cfb","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example: import sys

Behavior:
  → Detected via sys.builtin_module_names
  → Create edge (record dependency)
  → Return immediately (no further processing)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d0875b55-b560-48f1-9ddc-7a3fc7a5d8f2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"External Modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"713f6706-ac24-439e-8dc6-b741cd110b35","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example: import requests

Behavior:
  → Load module (not in project directory)
  → Record as external dependency
  → Return module name","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c68e0353-8daf-4ac0-bd36-f22bcebafc9b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"efaaa6fd-63d6-48e8-b8ba-0eb73b6724a2","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example: from myapp import utils

Behavior:
  → Load module (in project directory)
  → Record in graph
  → Convert to relative path for consistency
  → Return normalized module name","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cbe6beaf-07fd-4939-93d4-8c517e95dcb0","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4e419989-8267-4d43-a606-fcb0213aaa04","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Processing Steps","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b4891fdd-21da-4abd-b1d6-f1412de6afeb","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1.     ↓
handle_import() is invoked
    ├─ Built-in? → Record and exit
    ├─ External? → Record module name
    └─ Internal? → Record relative path
    ↓
Graph is updated","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7612f6c-3341-46f1-ae20-25d0f74c3adc","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1a4f0392-e793-42c9-b7db-a7ffbb908688","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Design Decisions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"251fd987-60fc-4e50-8562-2d6c276a41a3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Multiple Import Strategies","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f1f39b7-e180-4c69-a5ee-2b7a9d123cdf","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"combos = [(mod_name, package),
